rooms.description: A spacious entrance area that seamlessly transitions into the living room. Incorporates Vastu principles with a focus on energy flow, using natural elements like plants.
A serene open courtyard that acts as the heart of the floor plan, ensuring natural light and ventilation in accordance with local building norms.
An exclusive entertainment space designed with soundproofing, ambient lighting, and premium seating, offering a luxury experience.
A luxurious bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, designed following Vastu principles for positive energy.
A comfortable guest bedroom with attached facilities, ensuring privacy and convenience.
A dedicated workspace that doubles as a den, offering modern amenities for a bachelor pad lifestyle.

openings.description: A wide entrance door facilitating easy transition between spaces.
Large windows for natural light while maintaining privacy and adhering to Vastu principles.
Balcony overlooking the courtyard, ensuring scenic views.
